Technologies of History

HIST 30693 at Texas Christian University

A Sample Post

By

The easiest way to make your first post is to edit this one. Don’t forget to change the file name to update the YYYY-MM-DD-Title format. And remember that adding to your post tells the Jekyll convertor where to break off your “preview” of the post on the main page.

Written on March 15, 2021
